overview: Mija is Business Analyst for BigPond, Reporting & Data, Commercial Operations. Currenty manages the Reporting Inventory for Transformation and IT Systems. Currently located in Clarence Street Sydney, there will be a move to the Telstra Consumer & Channels area in George Street due to the BigPond’s structural changes implemented in Oct. Mija has spent the last 4 years with Telstra and has gained a lot of Telco knowledge in various positions within the company.
